thread.title: A happy shopper
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by A happy shopper

author: A happy shopper
title: A happy shopper
text: We had a very good experience at the store and then making our final decision online. The help at the store was great and very knowledgeable employees. Our only disappointment was that we could not get the loveseat in manual reclining and didn't feel like we could spend the extra money for the power recline so we settled for just sofa and recliner! Prices are very reasonable.
